problem.display_name: Do you know what a project is?
problem.markdown:
Do you remember? In the first section of this course, you were told what a project is and at what point a project is classified as such.
>>Can you still remember the four cornerstones that make a project a project?||Tick the four correct answers from the given options below <<
[x] A fixed start and end date. [ ] No limits. [ ] A project is the same as a process. [x] A project is a one-time activity. [x] Every project is in some way unique. [ ] A project has no limits related to among others quality and functionality. [x] A project has limits related to among others time and money.

choiceresponse.p: Do you remember? In the first section of this course, you were told what a project is and at what point a project is classified as such.
choiceresponse.label: Can you still remember the four cornerstones that make a project a project?
choiceresponse.description: Tick the four correct answers from the given options below

checkboxgroup.choice: A fixed start and end date.
A project is the same as a process.
A project is a one-time activity.
Every project is in some way unique.
A project has no limits related to among others quality and functionality.
A project has limits related to among others time and money.
